name: .UPK File Extension
summary: Learn about .UPK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: If you still have access to the Epic Games Unreal Development Kit or Unreal Engine 3 (Windows), you can import and open a UPK file in those programs. If you do not have access to UDK or Unreal Engine 3, you can open your UPK file in UE Viewer (Windows, Linux). UE Viewer allows users to view and extract various assets that UPK files contain.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
